mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_HIT) VALUES (NULL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, now(), 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_WRITER = #{boardWriter}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent} WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{endIndex}
